itemDisplayName: Extend an HDInsight Linux Cluster with RedPoint Data Management client software
description: This template adds a Windows(tm) VM to an existing Azure HDInsight Linux cluster. The worker will be a Windows(tm) machine that runs the Data Management client software; You must also have server software installed and configured on an edgenode. Lastly, you will need to manually license this product after installation completes.
summary: This template creates and configures a single VM: a Windows(tm) server that runs the Data Management client application
